name: Techpocalypse
blurb: What would you do if machines destroyed Earth's civilization? Find out in the survival strategy MMO that takes place in the real world.

rewards.reward: Kickstart Hero: Exclusive early access to the Techpocalypse closed beta test and every version thereafter. Access to the private community forums. Plus a massive crate of premium artifact treasures for you to keep and use forever, including: 1) Computer Hacker, a huge axe for "hacking" computers and other enemies; 2) Metal Detector, for revealing nearby machines; 3) Tesla Barrier blueprint, a Kickstarter exclusive tribe defense weapon ideal against attacking machines; and 4) Survivalist Poncho, a Kickstarter exclusive!

Tribe Leader: More premium artifacts, designed for leaders of men and women! As a Tribe Leader backer you'll be the envy of neighboring tribes with the elite Totem of the Moon Wolf, to boost the size of your tribe and enhance the combat ability of every member of your tribe. Plus everything from the "Kickstart Hero" tier!

Icon: We'll give your character a tasteful custom title of your choosing to show off to other players. In addition you'll receive the powerful Shadowpath Boots, which let you escape unscathed from enemies. Plus everything from the "Tribe Leader" tier!

Champion: Rally your neighbors to break all the machines in their houses with a high-quality propaganda poster of your choice (shown to the left), printed and delivered to you. In addition, see your name in lights! As a special "thank you," we'll put your name in the game credits. Plus everything from the "Icon" tier! Please add $15 for International shipping.

Legendary Smith: You'll receive a custom artifact armor or equipment hand-drawn to your tasteful specifications and unique to you - we'll never make it available to anyone else! Plus everything from the "Champion" tier.

Legendary Weaponsmith: You'll receive a custom artifact weapon hand-drawn to your tasteful specifications and unique to you - we'll never make it available to anyone else! Plus everything from the "Champion" tier.
Tycoon: Send us a photo or tasteful description of your real home or business, and your in-game house will become a custom, hand-drawn rendering of it. Plus everything from the "Champion" tier.
Armsmaster: Combines the rewards from the "Legendary Smith" AND "Legendary Weaponsmith" tiers, including everything from the "Champion" tier.

Mad Scientist: Send us your idea for your own monster or NPC (within some guidelines), and we\u2019ll put it into the game with hand-drawn art to your specifications. Want to see a malformed, poisonous cyber-tarantula?  You got it!  We'll add the tag "Designed by [your name]" to the creature for everyone to see. But that's not all - we'll even give you a copy of the creature as an exclusive pet, just for you! Plus everything from the "Champion" tier.

Collector: Includes everything from the Legendary Smith, Legendary Weaponsmith, Tycoon, and Mad Scientist tiers. You get a unique custom artifact armor/equipment, unique custom weapon, unique hand-drawn house, AND custom monster or NPC per your design. Plus, of course, everything from the "Champion" tier.

Superstar: We'll fly you out to Seattle to join the Anomaly Labs team for a day! Help us design a new portion of the game and get an inside look at video game development! We'll even credit you as a game designer!  Includes everything from the "Collector" tier.  (U.S. residents only please)
